Title: Reiruweizu: 49-sai de densha no untenshi ni natta otoko no monogatari
Actors: Kiichi Nakai, Reiko Takashima, Yuika Motokariya
Plot: Hajime is in line to be the next head of a prominent electronics company. He toils day and night over his work and has no time for his family. But one day, his mother in Shimane falls ill, and his best friend dies in an accident. ...
